sentence.Network_cn: 内德宽容地对他笑了笑。

sentence.Network_en: Indulgently, I lifted by right hand and made scissoring motions with my first two fingers.
sentence.Network_cn: 我放纵地用右手的两只手指拿着剪刀进行裁剪.

entry.def: If you are indulgent, you treat a person with special kindness, often in a way that is not good for them.

example.ex: His indulgent mother was willing to let him do anything he wanted.
example.tran: 他母亲很溺爱他，任由他想干什么就干什么。

sentences.sentence: "I was indulgently advised to give the kids what they wanted unless I wished my son to be socially ostracised"

auth_sentence.content: The Sheikh smiled again, this time indulgently.

auth_sentence.content: "Very funny," Ms. Hudson says, smiling indulgently.
